alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 10:23AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1100 AM MST... At 1023 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Boyce Thompson Arboretum, or 9 miles south of Superior, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior and Boyce Thompson Arboretum. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 221 and 223. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 166. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
